Class AnimationRectangles

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • AnimationRectangles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AnimationRectangles
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    This Class creates rectangle shapes for incoming notes from a Midi stream.
    Version:
    1.00, 24 January 2017
    Author:
    Bao Tran
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationRectangles(int pitch, int velocity, int xpos, long duration, long start, int channel)
      Constructor Creates a rectangle with y position that makes the entire bar not visible in the animation panel x position represents the key it plays as it animates down

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationRectangles

        public AnimationRectangles(int pitch,
                           int velocity,
                           int xpos,
                           long duration,
                           long start,
                           int channel)
        Constructor Creates a rectangle with y position that makes the entire bar not visible in the animation panel x position represents the key it plays as it animates down
        Parameters:
        pitch - The pitch of the note being generated
        velocity - The velocity of the note being generated
        xpos - The x position of the note being generated
        duration - The duration of the note being generated
        start - The time the note actually starts
        channel - The channel of the note being generated

        Animate this rectangle by increasing the y coordinate (Moving it down the screen)

        Returns:
        True if past 780
